annotations.description: Firefly is a beloved cult hit of a show that got murdered by Fox, but today I recreate Mudder's Milk from episode 7, Jayne's Town. Keep Flying, Browncoats. F...
annotations.title: Mudder's Milk from Firefly | How to Drink

textContent:
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Simple Syrup
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Creme De Cacao
1 egg white
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Bourbon
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Half & Half
Barspoon of Lemon Juice

Dry Shake & Shake Again
strain into tall mug
Top with Heavy porter (used Einstock Toasted Porter)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDVJGVZ9XFw
title: Mudder's Milk
